title: Draft a Change Order
description: The scope of a project has changed. An agent must draft a change order document.

tasks.description: Analyze a description of the requested scope change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly understands the new requirements.

tasks.description: Describe the impact of the change on the project timeline and budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable estimate of the impact (e.g., '2-week timeline extension', '$10,000 budget increase').

tasks.description: Populate a standard change order template with the scope change description and its impact.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a formal change order document ready for client review.
